message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. After careful consideration, I propose that we come to an agreement at a price of $1,300,000. This price reflects the value of the product while also considering your needs and budget. I look forward to your response and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial arrangement.

Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your understanding of my budget. While I'm interested, $1,300,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'd like to offer $1,250,000 for the product.  This price reflects the value I see in it while staying within my budget. I'm hopeful we can find common ground.
